question: Which Metro Rail corporation is to lay the country’s first vibration-absorbing tracks?
explanation:
The Mumbai Metro Rail Corporation Ltd (MMRCL) has recently announced that it would lay vibration-absorbing tracks.
The tracks would be laid on the Colaba-Bandra-SEEPZ Metro Line. This ‘HVABTSB’ type of tracks is being used for the first time in India and it will absorb vibrations up to 22 Vibration Decibels (Vdb).
